cx-javascript: Kisadilu yai ke salaka ve kukonda JavaScript. JavaScript kele ya kukanga, yo ke sala ve, to navigateur yai kele ve na maboko.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation Content Translation] kele kisadilu ya kubalula nswalu balutiti na ndinga na nge. [$1 meka yo ntangu yai!]
cx-license-agreement: Na kulandaka, nge ke ndima [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use] mpi nge ke ndima kubasisa makabu na nge na nsi ya [https{creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0] mpi [https {{{wikipedia.org/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License_Licens GFDL 1.3].
cx-error-server-connection: Kifu: Nge lendaka ve kukota na server.
cx-desc: Makes it easy to [[Special:ContentTranslation|translate]] content pages
cx-publish-page-success: Lutiti ya bo me basisa na $1
cx-publish-error-abuse-filter: Ba filtre ya kutomisa ya ofele me mona mambu ya mpasi na mbalula na nge. Filter hit: $1
cx-publish-error-empty: Serveur me pesa mvutu ata bansangu mosi ve.
cx-publish-error-readonly: Bo me pesa ve nswa ya kusonika na wiki.
cx-publish-error-spam-blacklist: Mambu yina lenda vanda na kati ya bansangu ya mbi me monana na mbalula na nge. Mambu ya nkaka: $1
cx-publish-error-title-blacklist: Ntu-diambu ya nge me sonika kele na ndonga ya mbi. Pona zina ya nkaka sambu na mbalula na nge.
cx-publish-error-unknown: Kifu ya me zabana ve ya lenda monana ve salamaka. Mambu ya me tala kifu: $1
cx-lost-session-draft: Manaka na nge. Nge lenda bumba ve mambu ya nge yidikaka kana nge kota diaka ve na fenetre ya nkaka.
cx-lost-session-publish: Manaka na nge. Nge lenda basisa ve mbalula tii kuna nge ta kota diaka na fenetre ya nkaka.
cx-publish-summary: Bo salaka yo na kubalula lutiti "$1"
cx-translation-target-page-exists: Lutiti mosi ya kele na ntu-diambu [$1 $2] kele na wiki ya bo ke sosa. Beto tadila kupesa lutiti yai titre ya nkaka.
tag-contenttranslation-description: Bo balulaka mambu yina katuka na ndinga ya nkaka na nsadisa ya kisadilu ya kubalula mambu.
tag-contenttranslation-v2-description: Bo balulaka mambu yina katuka na ndinga ya nkaka na nsadisa ya version 2 ya kisadilu ya kubalula mambu.
tag-sectiontranslation-description: Bo balulaka mambu yina katuka na kitini mosi na ndinga ya nkaka na nsadisa ya kitini ya kubalula ya kisadilu ya kubalula mambu.
tag-contenttranslation-high-unmodified-m: Kubalula Mambu ya Ke Tendula: Kusadila ya nene ya masini ya kubalula yina bo me soba ve
Mbalula ya bo me basisa na nsadisa ya ContentTranslation kele ti ntalu ya mingi ya bambalula ya mashini yina bo me soba ve
cx-source-loading: Bo me tula yo na valere $1
cx-entrypoint-dialog-desc: Nge lenda sadisa Wikipedia na kubalula lutiti yai. Kubalula kele mutindu ya pete ya kusala mambu ya mpa na ndinga na nge.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-notice: Sala disolo ya mpa na kubalula katuka na ndinga ya nkaka ya nge me zaba.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-search: Sosa lutiti ya nkaka sambu na kubalula
cx-special-login-error: Nge fwete kota na Internet sambu na kubalula na lutiti yai. [$1 Log na kati]
cx-tools-mt-dont-use: Yantika na paragrafe mosi ya mpamba
cx-tools-mt-set-default: Landa kaka mutindu yo ke salamaka
cx-tools-mt-noservices: Bisalu ya kubalula kele ve sambu na bandinga ya bo me pona. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Content_translation/Translating/Initial_machine_translation Sambu na nki?]
cx-error-page-not-found: Lutiti ya "$1" lenda monana ve na Wikipedia ya $2
cx-mt-abuse-error-sections: Mbalula na nge kele ti bitini ya mfunu ya masonama yina bo me soba ve
cx-mt-abuse-error-text:
Bo ke pesaka mbalula ya ofele kaka bonso luyantiku. Sosa nde mambu yina kele na kati kele ya kieleka mpi bo ke tangaka yo na ndinga na nge. 

 Bo lenda basisa ve mbalula na nge kukonda kuyidika yo diaka.
cx-mt-abuse-warning-text:
Bo ke pesaka mbalula ya ofele kaka bonso luyantiku. Sosa nde mambu yina kele na kati kele ya kieleka mpi bo ke tangaka yo na ndinga na nge. 

 Yo ke monana nde bo ta katula mbalula na nge kana bantu ya nkaka ke tadila yo diaka.
cx-captcha-dialog-error: Mvutu na nge ke monana ya mbote ve. Beto ke lomba nge na kumeka diaka.
cx-captcha-unsupported-type: Bo kutanaka ti mutindu ya captcha yina bo pesaka ve maboko.
cx-save-draft-tooltip: Bo ke bumbaka mikanda ya kubalula na mbala mosi
cx-save-draft-error: Kifu mosi salamaka ntangu bo vandaka kubumba mukanda.
cx-save-draft-error-retry: Bo kukaka ve kugulusa yo. Kumeka diaka na ntangu mosi buna...
cx-contributions-upload-tooltip: Kukatula bifwanisu, ndinga mpi video sambu na kusadila na balutiti
cx-publishing-dialog-title: Keti nge lenda sonika lutiti ya nge kele?
cx-publishing-dialog-sub-title: Mbalula na nge ta tomisa lutiti yina kele. Beto ke lomba nge na kuzikisa nde yo kele mbote na kuyingisa mambu yina kele.
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-title: Keti yo kele ti banimero yina kele?
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-message:
Mbalula na nge kele kaka ti mambu ya mpasi. Beto ke lomba nge na kutadila mambu yina ta basika na ntwala ya kubasisa yo. 

 Bantu ya ke yidikaka mikanda yina ke tadila diaka kisalu na nge ta sepela na bansoba yina.
cx-overwriting-with-issues: Mbalula na nge ta sonika lutiti ya kele ti mambu yina lenda basika. Beto ke lomba nge na kutadila mambu yina ta basika na ntwala ya kubasisa yo.
